title: SCP LEGO DIORAMA
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:info:start]]
**Title:** SCP LEGO DIORAMA
**Original:** http://scpko.wikidot.com/lego-mr-fig
**Author:** [[*user Mr fig]]
**Translator:** [[*user 2018]]
[[include :scp-wiki:info:end]]
> I made an SCP diorama using Lego bricks. Photos like this will be taken additionally. I will continue to upload photos to this page.

================{Diorama}==================
